info.additionalInfo: For the icon links to work, enable this http://userstyles.org/styles/61962/tumblr-icon-fix then this http://userstyles.org/styles/61662/tumblr-harry-potter-icons-for-site-icon-update but don't worry your Harry Potter icon pictures will be the only ones shown, not the Powerpuuf Girl images. contact me at http://acciothemarauders.tumblr.com
